extracted_entities.name: MLOps25 - Workshop on Machine Learning Operations

topics_of_interest: Practices to ensure ML model reproducibility, traceability, and explainability
Continuous integration/continuous delivery (CI/CD) practices for ML models
Application of MLOps principles to large language models (LLMOps)
Experience reports on real-world MLOps applications
Challenges in applying MLOps to specific domains (e.g., healthcare and finance)
Collaboration and team dynamics in MLOps
Regulatory and policy aspects of MLOps
Security and data privacy in MLOps

submission_guidelines.requirements: Submitted work must be original, previously unpublished, and not under consideration or review by any other publication venue.

formatting_instructions.style: CEURART style required by CEUR Workshop Proceedings

submission.evaluation: Each manuscript will receive at least two evaluations from the program committee

accepted_papers.extended_versions: consideration in the 'Special Issue on MLOps Advancements' in Future Generation Computer Systems (FGCS)
